name: BIA: Housing Improvement Program
description: Helps with home repair, renovation, replacement, and new housing for American Indian and Alaska Native individuals and families with no resources for standard housing.
fullDescription: Helps with home repair, renovation, replacement, and new housing for American Indian and Alaska Native individuals and families with no resources for standard housing.
whatTheyOffer: The Bureau of Indian Affairs enhances the quality of life and protects and improves the trust assets of American Indians, Indian tribes, and Alaska Natives.
howToGetIt:
Eligibility requirements:
- The applicant has limited income and resources
- The applicant is a member of an American Indian Tribe or an Alaska Native

Visit the official website or call for more information.
